title: Noun collection 3
sentences: Wir wandern heute auf den höchsten
We are hiking to the highest mountain in the region.
The sun is shining very brightly today.
In der Nacht kann man viele
At night you can see many stars.
The water in the lake is pleasantly warm.
I water my plants every morning.
The bird is singing a beautiful song.
We live in a small village near the border.
The country has a very interesting history.
I have to fill out an important form.
Do you have your ID with you?
The truth is sometimes hard to say.
I wish you much luck for the future.
In the future I want to speak German fluently.
We must protect the environment better.
The law applies to all citizens.
I found a small mistake in the text.
Love is the most important thing in life.
Do you know the capital of Germany?
The state is investing in new schools.
The light in the room is too bright.
I need a permit for parking.
dictionary:
der Berg - mountain
die Sonne - sun
der Stern (Pl. Sterne) - star
das Wasser - water
die Pflanze (Pl. Pflanzen) - plant
der Vogel - bird
das Dorf - village
das Land - country / land
das Formular - form
der Ausweis - ID card
die Wahrheit - truth
das Glück - luck / happiness
die Zukunft - future
die Umwelt - environment
das Gesetz - law
der Fehler - mistake
die Liebe - love
die Hauptstadt - capital city
der Staat - state
das Licht - light
die Vergangenheit - past
die Natur - nature
die Erlaubnis - permit / permission
das Wunder - miracle
die Freiheit - freedom
